reviewtext: These V6's sound amazing. Especially for the price. I purchased them "used" from Amazon warehouse and I can't tell them from a brand new pair. I compared the sound quality against a set of $300 Bose QC 15's that I have for my many business trips and the Sony's sound significantly better. Of course, they are not noise cancelling, so I will still use the QC15 for trips. But for listening around the house or at the office, hands down I would use the V6s.
